verses.verse: <S%H4905>Maschil<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>; A <S%H8605>Prayer<s%> when he was in the <S%H4631>cave<s%>. I <S%H2199>cried<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> with my <S%H6963>voice<s%>; with my <S%H6963>voice<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> did I make my <S%H2603>supplication<s%>.
I poured <S%H8210>out<s%> my <S%H7879>complaint<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him; I <S%H5046>shewed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him my <S%H6869>trouble<s%>.

When my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> was <S%H5848>overwhelmed<s%> within me, then thou <S%H3045>knewest<s%> my <S%H5410>path<s%>. In the <S%H734>way<s%> <S%H2098>wherein<s%> I <S%H1980>walked<s%> have they privily <S%H2934>laid<s%> a <S%H6341>snare<s%> for me.

I <S%H5027>looked<s%> on my right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, and <S%H7200>beheld<s%>, but there was no man that would <S%H5234>know<s%> me: <S%H4498>refuge<s%> <S%H6>failed<s%> me; no man <S%H1875>cared<s%> for my <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
I <S%H2199>cried<s%> unto thee, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: I <S%H559>said<s%>, Thou art my <S%H4268>refuge<s%> and my <S%H2506>portion<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%>.

<S%H7181>Attend<s%> unto my <S%H7440>cry<s%>; for I am <S%H1809>brought<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1809>low<s%>: <S%H5337>deliver<s%> me from my <S%H7291>persecutors<s%>; for they are <S%H553>stronger<s%> than I.

<S%H3318>Bring<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> out of <S%H4525>prison<s%>, that I may <S%H3034>praise<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%>: the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall compass me <S%H3803>about<s%>; for thou shalt deal <S%H1580>bountifully<s%> with me.
